verbose_text: To explore the effects of acutely raising plasma glucose in diabetic patients, glucose was raised from 103 +/- 8 to ~ 300 mg/dL (from 5.7 +/- 0.4 to ~ 16.7 mmol/L) by infusion of 20% dextrose and maintained at this level for 24 h (XREF_FIG, left panels).
evidence: glucose was raised from 103 +/- 8 to ~300 mg/dL (from 5.7 +/- 0.4 to ~16.7 mmol/L) by infusion of 20% dextrose
